fields.name: mode
fields.description: Mode - will this emitter fire once or keep firing?

fields.name: reflect
fields.description: Reflection mode - how do particles interact with walls?

fields.name: bounce
fields.description: Bounce mode - particles can bounce on the floor

fields.name: count
fields.description: Rate of fire- how many particles to fire (possibly per second)

fields.name: velocity
fields.description: Velocity - maximum velocity of a particle (in px/s)

fields.name: rotationalVelocity
fields.description: Rotation velocity - maximum rotational velocity of a particle (in rotations/s)

fields.name: minLife
fields.description: Min lifetime - minimum time a particle persists, in seconds

fields.name: maxLife
fields.description: Max lifetime - maximum time a particle persists, in seconds

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
